Two simple things:

1. The traffic on this list is low enough that this is NOT REALLY any 
kind of problem.
2. The noise that this unnecessary discussion is creating is worse than 
the "noise" the actual thread is creating.

Let's use an XP approach here: wait until it really becomes a problem. 
Then, and only then, will we ask the discussion to move to another list.

JBR. (My one and only message on the topic.)

Chris Eppstein wrote:

> I, too, was interested to read this email and maybe I was out of line, 
> but I
> think the whole point of having different mailing lists is to let people
> read the posts relevant to their interests. <snip />
